Text: Man - thanks for wonderful uploads - may I ask what scanner I should buy or what scanner are you using...I want to scan and share a couple of my own but the street services are bloody expensive :( Looking to buy a machine but need your advice as the way you do the scans is exactly what I am looking for...Hope to hear a word and thx much in advance!
Use any entry level flatbed scanner, no need for the high end ones; but use minimum 300dpi for scanning. I use a HP scanner that cost me $100 approx.
Very helpful advice - may I ask for the model? Or I guess I am wondering what is the ADF capacity of yours and how long it took you to make the 500-pager above?

I have not scanned this particular book but have edited it from someone else's scan. When I scan a book, I mention so in the description. My scanner model is G2410, but you will probably get newer ones as this is almost 3 yrs old
